metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38096 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability was found in vmwgfx driver in drivers/gpu/vmxgfx/vmxgfx_execbuf.c in GPU component of Linux kernel with device file '/dev/dri/renderD128 (or Dxxx)'. This flaw allows a local attacker with a user account on the system to gain privilege, causing a denial of service(DoS).

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
